trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes a 2-D drawing.
trans-unit.target: 描述 2D 繪圖的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法由您的程式碼所繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects are light-weight objects that enable you to add geometric shapes, images, text, and media to an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> 物件是輕量級物件，可讓您將應用程式中加入幾何形狀、 影像、 文字與媒體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects are considered light-weight because they do not provide support for [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md), [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md), and focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> 物件會被視為輕量級，因為它們不提供支援[配置](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)，[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)，和焦點。

trans-unit.source: Because of their performance benefits, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: 因為其效能優勢，繪圖十分適用於背景或美工圖案。

trans-unit.source: You also use drawings when programming at the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> level.
trans-unit.target: 在設計程式時也使用繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>層級。

trans-unit.source: Because they inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects provide additional features that make them useful for describing clip art and backgrounds: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因為它們是繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>物件提供額外的功能，使它們分別適合用來描述美工圖案和背景： 可以宣告為共用多個物件，變成唯讀的並進行安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: There are different types of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects for different types of content: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.
trans-unit.target: 有不同類型的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>不同類型的內容物件： <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得繪圖內容的軸對齊週框。

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 繪圖內容的軸對齊週框。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
